backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and mastering projects with access control, including create, update, and query operations.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated report mapping feature fixes to affected frontend audio files and associated components/tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A list of prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose, focusing on audio processing, UI, and i18n.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app wiring routing, theming, i18n, authentication UI, layout, and global providers.
frontend/src/audio/engine.ts: Web Audio mastering engine implementing EQ, saturation, compression, stereo width routing, and reference‑mode processing.
frontend/src/audio/metadata.ts: Validates uploaded audio files and extracts duration, sample rate, and channel count using Web Audio API.
frontend/src/audio/presets.ts: Defines the MasteringPreset interface and provides several mastering preset configurations with EQ, compression, limiter, saturation, stereo width, and gain settings.
frontend/src/audio/wavExport.ts: Renders audio to WAV using an offline audio context, applying EQ, saturation, compression, limiting, stereo width, and output gain based on a preset.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to set a display name and saves it via profile hooks.
frontend/src/components/HelpFAQ.tsx: Displays a help and FAQ section using i18n data with a list of questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Dropdown menu allowing users to switch between supported languages using the i18n system.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Lists user projects with preset info, creation date, and delete actions, using project-related hooks and i18n.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallEntryP: Shows a button to trigger PWA installation when supported, using state from a custom visibility hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch, create, and delete mastering projects through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallVisibili: Tracks PWA installation state and exposes a method to trigger the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile using React Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n provider storing language in localStorage and exposing translations via context.
frontend/src/i18n/presets.ts: Contains localized names and descriptions for mastering presets in Portuguese and English.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines full localization strings for the app in Portuguese and English.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a simple hook to access the i18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Renders the landing page with hero, workflow sections, translations, and authentication-based navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MasteringStudio.tsx: Main React page for the audio mastering UI, handling file loading, playback modes, presets, reference tracks, and project creation. Manages MasteringEngine lifecycle, validation, metadata extraction, and user interactions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading and writing URL parameters and persisting them in sessionStorage. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing and allows clearing parameters from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings. Includes typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s state, including known issues and required fixes related to audio playback and WAV export for mono and stereo files.
